snippet: An Italian court last week upheld a 2014 appeal won by the dancer and ordered the theater to pay her back wages from her firing in February 2012 until she won that appeal.
abstract: An Italian court last week upheld a 2014 appeal won by the dancer and ordered the theater to pay her back wages from her firing in February 2012 until she won that appeal.

byline.original: By ELISABETTA POVOLEDO and ROSLYN SULCAS

headline.main: Court Orders La Scala to Reinstate Dancer Who Spoke of Anorexia
headline.print_headline: La Scala Ordered to Reinstate Dancer
